title: Fix MCQ marks to 1, add upload/generation success popups, and show generated paper preview

requirements.text: Update the MCQ category marking scheme from its current value to 1 mark in the backend Question type definition and throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: MCQ questions are consistently displayed as 1 mark in the UI
Paper generation correctly calculates total marks with MCQ as 1 mark each
Generated paper preview shows MCQ section with 1 mark per question

requirements.text: Fix the generated paper preview display issue so that generated papers are shown immediately after the generation process completes

quotes: it is not showuing generated paper

acceptanceCriteria: After clicking Generate Paper button, the paper preview displays without requiring manual navigation
All 5 variants (A-E) are visible in the preview
Questions are properly organized into sections A, B, and C

requirements.text: Add a success popup notification in AddQuestion.tsx that appears immediately after a file is successfully uploaded via bulk upload, showing confirmation that the file has been processed

quotes: if file uploaded provide pop up message that it has uploaded

acceptanceCriteria: Popup appears immediately after file upload completes
Message clearly states the file was successfully uploaded and processed
Popup includes the count of questions successfully added
Popup can be dismissed by the user

requirements.text: Add a success popup notification in GeneratePaper.tsx that appears after question papers are successfully generated, confirming the generation and automatically showing the generated paper preview

quotes: if question paper generated probvide popup and show generated paper

acceptanceCriteria: Popup appears immediately after paper generation completes
Message confirms successful generation of all 5 paper variants
After popup is dismissed or auto-closes, user is redirected to the paper preview page
The generated paper data is correctly passed to the preview page

constraints: Do not modify files in frontend/src/components/ui directory
Maintain the existing single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo
nonGoals: Changing the overall paper generation algorithm beyond MCQ marks fix
Altering the bulk upload file format requirements
Redesigning the UI layout or color scheme
